title: Please Select Your Agency
text: Looking for a copy of your Texas Peace Officer's Crash Report (CR-3)? Purchase one here. Please select your Agency The Application or Service you are trying to reach requires you to authenticate with your home Agency. I work for the Texas Department of Transportation I use CRIS to enter Crash Reports, and I am a member of the following Agency: I use CRIS to enter Crash Reports (law enforcement) or analyze data (City, MPO, Federal, etc. governmental entity), but My Agency is not shown above I only use CRIS to download Interface Requests I only use CRIS to purchase Crash Reports on behalf of an organization Need assistance? Checking Operator Status... The help desk can also be reached at (844) CRIS-HLP. Your Browser does not support javascript. Please use this link .
